homeHeader.title: Register, Launch, and Scale Your Business- Get Licensed in Under 60 Minutes in Meydan Free Zone
homeHeader.description: Struggling with complex company registration regulations, missing documents, or endless paperwork? At One Nexuz, our skilled business consultants do all the heavy lifting, so you can start growing from day one! Set up your business in the heart of Dubai in Meydan Free Zone today to enjoy unmatched flexibility, 100% foreign ownership, and 0% import-export, corporate, and personal income taxes.

leftSection_1.title: Discover Key Benefits of Meydan Free Zone Business Setup
leftSection_1.description: Maximise growth opportunities and minimise expenses with Meydan Free Zone’s seamless business incorporation solutions, allowing entrepreneurs and investors to start operating from anywhere, anytime.

leftSection_5.title: Fast-Track Meydan Free Zone Company Formation in 5 Easy Steps

items.title: Pick a Business Activity
items.description: We’ll schedule a free consultation to discuss your unique business setup needs. Then we’ll match you with the ideal business activities.

items.title: Choose a Trade Name
items.description: Craft, search, and register DED-compliant company names that align with your business’s values, mission, and future goals.

items.title: Submit Your Applications
items.description: Next, we’ll assist you in compiling all the necessary documents, filling out the paperwork, and securing the initial licensing approvals.

items.title: Lease or Rent an Office
items.description: Browse through our extensive catalogue of physical, flexi-desk, co-working, and virtual offices to expedite business setup.

items.title: Receive Your Trade License
items.description: We’ll pay the licensing fees on your behalf and issue your business license. You’ll receive it in a week via mail or email.

items.title: Apply for a Visa & Bank Account
items.description: Lastly, we offer post-licensing support to help you secure the necessary visas and open a corporate bank account.

items.title: Personalised Setup Guidance
items.description: Our local experts match you with the ideal business activity from 2500+ options, saving you AED 1,000+ in non-compliance and tax exemptions.

items.title: All-in-One Business Solutions
items.description: Get your trade license, visa, bank account, and a full suite of cutting-edge management solutions all under one roof to thrive in Meydan’s fast-evolving landscape.

items.title: Stay 100% DED Compliant
items.description: Expand your business reach across Dubai Mainland with a dual license, empowering you to tap into fast-growing markets and seamless import-export.

items.quote: Setting up my online store in Meydan Free Zone was unbelievably smooth. I had my license in just a few days, and the support team guided me at every step. Now I’m selling globally with a Dubai business address that builds instant trust with customers.

As a freelancer, I wanted full ownership and flexibility without high overhead costs. Meydan Free Zone gave me exactly that. The process was straightforward, affordable, and I could start offering my services almost immediately.

Choosing Meydan Free Zone was the best decision for my trading business. The central Dubai location makes logistics easy, and the ability to manage multiple business activities under one license saves both time and money.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Is Meydan Free Zone a good option for businesses?
items.answer: Meydan Free Zone offers a 100% paperless business setup, streamlining company registration and empowering you with unrestricted access to world-class infrastructure, fully serviced offices, and networking events.

items.question: What documents will I receive with my trade license?
items.answer: You’ll receive company formation documents, including a certificate of formation, lease agreement, and MoA.

items.question: Do I have to pay taxes in Meydan Free Zone?
items.answer: No, Meydan Free Zone offers a tax-free environment, empowering you to save thousands on corporate and personal income tax.

items.question: Is there a minimum capital requirement for MFZ company formation?
items.answer: No, there is no minimum capital requirement for launching a business in Meydan FZ.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me set up in other UAE Free Zones beyond Meydan?
items.answer: Yes, One Nexuz offers holistic services for countless FZ besides MFZ, including Fujairah, RAKEZ, Abu Dhabi, and more!
